page.title: 10YOUTH CLUBS IN PRENTON
page.content: {PRENTON YOUTH CLUB. Opened in 1970, it organises games like football, snooker and tennis for young people up to 21 years old. The club has three leaders and about 200 members. There is a coffee bar selling sweets, crisps and drinks. Day trips and camping holidays are arranged both locally and further afield. The youth centre has groups for pensioners and toddlers and also a keep fit class. {PRENTON METHODIST YOUTH CLUB. For 4 years, the club has been open for children from 10 to 17 years, and has about 55 members. In addition to the games inside the club, swimming, iceskating and rounders are organised. To encourage children to come, a programme of activities, including cooking, is being arranged. There is a tuck shop selling chocolate bars, sweets and drinks.
